item.title: DO CRY
item.description:
DO CRY is a BLURBSMITH concept ad for Milo.

I love Milo and drink it every day. I always put too much Milo in — I just can’t help myself — and spill it over the sides. Then I lick the spilt Milo from the bench-top.

item.title: THE GREATEST
item.description:
THE GREATEST is a BLURBSMITH concept ad for Cadbury.

Cherry Ripes have been a taste sensation since the day I took my first bite. But the Dark Ganache is next-level incredible and the greatest thing since the original Cherry Ripe was born, 90 years ago now.

item.title: ALL i
item.description:
“ALL i” is a BLURBSMITH concept ad for the BMW i SERIES.

While my Christmas wish didn’t come true this year, I still love this simple 3 part campaign. I’m sure Santa came good on this for more than a few others who wished for a new i Series BMW.

I’ve proudly lived car-free for 15 years and I feel much greener for it. I’ve been contemplating ownership again recently and my two critical criteria are fuel economy and environmental footprint. So when I learned of the BWM i Series, I fell in love: a car that uses no fuel — for up to 360km — is very green and very me. And while the i8 is beyond reach for many, the i3 is within reach for most… especially given the long-term fuel and environmental savings.

You can read more about the i3 range on the official BMW website: www.bmw.com.au/i

item.title: ESCAPE ME
item.description:
ESCAPE ME is BLURBSMITH concept ad for Calvin Klein.

I wrote the ESCAPE ME blurb first and then fitted it to a brand: Calvin Klein feels befitting. I love this blurb and it would work just as well with so many other brands and products.

item.title: ONLY EVER
item.description:
ONLY EVER is a BLURBSMITH ad for SockHeight.

Cycling is an escape, an addiction, a passion, a profession. It’s many different things to so many of us, but there’s one absolute for all of us… it’s never about the bike.

item.title: IN YOUR EYES
item.description:
IN YOUR EYES is a BLURBSMITH concept ad for Ray Ban.

This blurb is an adaptation of my original IN YOUR ARMS verse: In your arms I am free, In your arms we are we, etc.

item.title: YOUR BOYS
item.description:
YOUR BOYS is a BLURBSMITH concept ad for Bonds.

Subtly speaking to both male and female audiences, YOUR BOYS is a cheeky, in-season, on-topic ad perfect for Bonds and the hot Aussie Summer. I’m a Bonds boy from way back, and the Bonds Active range is the best Bonds yet. I swear my boys are 5 degrees cooler…

item.title: VERY HAPPY JAN
item.description:
VERY HAPPY JAN is a BLURBSMITH ad for Specialized

Celebrating his 3rd place Hawaii Ironman debut, VERY HAPPY JAN was born in my brain the second I saw this Jan Frodeno finish-line photo. I couldn’t help myself — I instantly bought the image rights from Delly Carr and coupled Germany’s Jan with our own Aussie Jan to make sweet Jan love. After all, Jan is very happy… and we all know he’s secretly Australian.
